name: Greedy Sky Serpent
description:
Greedy Sky Serpent is a simple twin-stick shooter for PC. The goal is to kill enemies, grow your tail, and increase your score.

The playable character is a dragon. The game is divided into four “levels”: morning, day, evening, and night, all of which end in a boss fight. The player encounters different enemies throughout the game; besides the basic flying eyes there are “early birds”, gryphons and more.

Controls
WASD/L stick - Move
Mouse/R stick - Aim
LMB/RB - Fire
RMB/A - Berserk mode

Development Team
Max Louhio - Programming, particles
Veera Tikkamäki - Programming
Antti Tuomisto - Programming
Jutta Urama - Graphics
